text: São Bernardo do Campo () is a Brazilian city in the ABC Region, state of São Paulo. Its population in 2003 was 745,161. Its area is . The city was founded in 1553, one of the first cities in Brazil. São Bernardo do Campo is very known because of the automobiles industries that came in 1950s, like: Volkswagen, Mercedes-Benz, Daimler Chrysler and Ford. == Other websites == * Official site of São Bernardo do Campo Category:1550s establishments in South America Category:16th-century establishments in Brazil
title: São Bernardo do Campo
